title: "One Brain Region Teaches Another During Sleep, Converting New Data Into Enduring Memories"
excerpt: "Using a neural network model, neuroscientists discovered that as the body moves between REM and slow-wave sleep cycles, the hippocampus and neocortex interact in ways that are key to memory formation."
